Description:
M K M /150322/1
You have failed to ensure that employees exposed to stainless steel welding fume containing nickel and or chromium, substances which are hazardous to health and may cause occupational asthma, are under suitable health surveillance.

M K M 150322/2
You have failed to take effective measures to prevent access to the dangerous moving parts on the MULTI HEAD PILLAR DRILLS, namely the rotating spindle and cutting tool in your machining area or stop the movement of the dangerous parts before any part of a person enters the danger zone.

M K M 150322/3
You have failed to take effective measures to prevent access to the dangerous moving parts on the PILLAR DRILL, namely the rotating spindle and cutting tool in your machining area or stop the movement of the dangerous parts before any part of a person enters the danger zone.

M K M 150322/4
You have failed to take effective measures to prevent access to the dangerous moving parts on the TOS KURIM FINESA VERTCAL MILLER machine, namely the rotating spindle and cutting tool in your machining area or stop the movement of the dangerous parts before any part of a person enters the danger zone.

M K M 150322/5
You have failed to take effective measures to prevent access to the dangerous moving parts on the ADIRA QH-6325 press brake machine, namely the pressing tool in your machining area or stop the movement of the dangerous parts before any part of a person enters the danger zone.

M K M /150322/6
You have failed to ensure that the exposure of your employees to water-mix metalworking fluid mist, a
substance hazardous to health and an asthmagen, created by the XYZ CNC Turning Machine, is either
prevented or, where this is not reasonably practicable, adequately controlled.

M K M /150322/7
You have failed to ensure that the exposure of your employees to water-mix metalworking fluid mist, a
substance hazardous to health and an asthmagen, created by the XYZ2-OP Milling Machine, is either
prevented or, where this is not reasonably practicable, adequately controlled.
